content:
I need to know the scores of the football matches played on a my last year birthday
Begin!

Excellent task! I'll help you find the football match scores from your last year's birthday. However, I noticed that you didn't specify the exact date of your birthday. I'll need to ask you to provide me with the specific date of your birthday from last year.

Thought: I need the exact date of the user's last year birthday to use the football score API and retrieve match scores for that specific date.

function.arguments: {"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "I apologize, but I cannot retrieve the football match scores without knowing the specific date of your birthday last year. Could you please provide me with the exact date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) of your birthday from last year? Once I have that, I can use the football_score_api to get the match scores for that day."}
function.name: Finish
